org.waarp.common.utility

Class WaarpThreadFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.waarp.common.utility.WaarpThreadFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ThreadFactory

    public class WaarpThreadFactory
extends Object
implements ThreadFactory
    Thread Factory that build named threads, by default daemon threads.
    Author:
    Frederic Bregier
